nl.renarj.jasdb.core

Interface RemoteService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConsoleService, DummyRemoteService, RestService

    public interface RemoteService
    This represents the remote service that can be started by the kernel for providing the jasdb data services remotely
    Author:
    Renze de Vries

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ServiceInformation getServiceInformation()
      Provides servicing information that can be used by remote endpoints to connect to this remote service.
      boolean isEnabled()
      Returns wether this remote service is enabled
      void startService()
      Called during kernel startup, can be used to initialize any servicing components
      void stopService()
      Called during kernel shutdown, can be used to cleanup used resources

    • Method Detail

      • isEnabled

        boolean isEnabled()
        Returns wether this remote service is enabled
        Returns:
        True is the service is enabled, False if not

      • startService

        void startService()
                  throws JasDBException
        Called during kernel startup, can be used to initialize any servicing components
        Throws:
        ServiceException - If unable to start the remote service
        JasDBException

      • stopService

        void stopService()
                 throws JasDBException
        Called during kernel shutdown, can be used to cleanup used resources
        Throws:
        ServiceException - If unable to cleanly stop the remote service
        JasDBException

      • getServiceInformation

        ServiceInformation getServiceInformation()
        Provides servicing information that can be used by remote endpoints to connect to this remote service. This can be used for auto discovery in grid mode.
        Returns:
        The service information
